description: Key-Value Pair Database optimized for image-generation prompting. Keys are JSON paths using dot-notation.

entries.description: Camera/lens/lighting choices and their visible body/scene effects.
values: slight high angle (slims face, emphasizes eyes)
slight low angle (adds power, elongates legs)
wide-angle full body (adds depth, stronger perspective)
deep depth of field (full scene clarity)

entries.description: Useful photography keywords for prompt tuning.
How much of the subject is visible in frame.
Hairstyle / texture / arrangement optimized for photoreal prompts.
